related_post.text: I want to convert numbers like 8032 to 80,32. How Can I make it set commas after 2 characters without setting a comma after the last digit?

so_post.text: For formatting numbers you should likely not try doing it yourself. This SO thread might help: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1823058/howtoprintnumberwithcommasasthousandsseparators

comments: asks question about formatting and gets direct SO answer
